name: vitali2

body.origin:
|- wpss(cdm(cvol), cpw(cr))
-| wex(hs0, wwe(cv(hs0), cr))
-| wi(wex(hs0, wwe(cv(hs0), cr)), wpss(cdm(cvol), cpw(cr)))
body.pretty:
⊢ dom(vol)⊊ P(ℝ)
⊣ ∃(hs0, hs0 ≤ ℝ)
⊣ (∃(hs0, hs0 ≤ ℝ)→ dom(vol)⊊ P(ℝ))

⊣ (∃(hs0, hs0 ≤ ℝ)→ dom(vol)⊊ P(ℝ))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(cr, universe), wex(hs0, wwe(cv(hs0), cr)))
-| diffsc(hs0, cr)

cumulated.origin:

body.origin:
|- wi(wex(hs0, wwe(cv(hs0), cr)), wpss(cdm(cvol), cpw(cr)))
-| wi(wwe(cv(hs0), cr), wpss(cdm(cvol), cpw(cr)))

⊣ (hs0 ≤ ℝ → dom(vol)⊊ P(ℝ))
⊣ d(hs0, dom(vol)⊊ P(ℝ))

comment: There are non-measurable sets (the Axiom of Choice is used, in the invoked ~ weth ). (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
